Attacks.Name: Water Gun
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character is pushed away S distance from Seel.

Attacks.Name: Ice Shard
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the Slow special condition.

Attacks.Name: Headbutt
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character gains the Stun special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Thick Fat
Superpowers.Effect: Reduce damage from Fire and Ice type attacks by 1, to a minimum of 1.

Superpowers.Name: Hydration
Superpowers.Effect: At the start of this character's activation, if it has the Soaked special condition, remove all special conditions from it.

Attacks.Name: Aqua Jet
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Seel may make an immediate move action. If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the Stun special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Rest
Superpowers.Effect: Remove 2 damage from this character and remove all special conditions. This character gains the Sleep special condition until the end of its next activation. This superpower can be used only once per game.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Dewgong character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
